name: Murder on the Titanic
overview: Yet early in the evening of April 14th, Captain Smith unexpectedly requests Larsson's help. Deep within the bowels of the mighty Titanic, the body of a stoker had been discovered. Now it is up to you to solve this murder. - 50 faithfully depicted scenes on board the luxurious Titanic - Lots of tricky mini-games for pondering and puzzling - A gripping story with numerous tasks and puzzles over six extensive chapters - first hidden object adventure game at the eShop
